name: Robber Run (GruseT)
description:
A 3d sidescrolling runner game where you play as a thief avoiding obstacles and collecting coins.

Music and SFX was not made by me. Found on freesound and opengameart.

This game was made in 1 week as a submission for the Godot Wild Jam #33.

You can find the source code here.

Thank you for playing my game, feedback is greatly appreciated!
